component.name: ArdorQuery
component.summary: Rest API, GraphQL, HTTP(s) testing tool
component.description: ArdorQuery is a UI tool for performing any HTTP(S) endpoints like REST API, HTML, Images, GraphQL, OData etc. Similar to cURL and Postman. The main goal is to make an application with minimal user interface and keyboard oriented.

description.p: Fixed layout for OpenAPI Export routes list.
Added support "spaced" global variables like this {{ name }}.
Added keyboard shortcuts for Global Variables window.
Unsaved changes after close Global Variables window will be abandoned.
Fixed order of global variables in Global Variables window.
